meanings.definition: The projection of a horse's leg behind the joint between the cannon bone and the pastern.
meanings.sent1: The horse's fetlock was strong and sturdy.
meanings.sent2: I brushed the fetlock gently to remove any dirt.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous foal tried to nibble on the fetlock of the older horse.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a fetlock, supporting her through the race.
meanings.sent5: The fetlock swayed gracefully as the horse galloped across the field.

meanings.definition: The tuft of hair growing on this projection.
meanings.sent1: The black fetlock of the horse contrasted with its white coat.
meanings.sent2: She braided the fetlock to keep the hair neat and tidy.
meanings.sent3: The playful colt liked to tug on the fetlock hair during grooming.
meanings.sent4: Her flowing hair resembled the fetlock of a majestic stallion.
meanings.sent5: The golden strands of the fetlock shimmered in the sunlight.
